entry.title: All Human Wisdom
entry.summary:
Author: braceyourself

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 668Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Merlin has long survived off the poignant and often slender hope that Arthur feels the connection between them at least a fraction as keenly as he himself does. Hope that the man cares more than a master does for his servant. Hope that his existence matters to Arthur for more than just chores and entertainment. That his callous attitude is truly just a front for genuine affection. Having his hope validated so blatantly out loud is something Merlin could never have anticipated.

entry.title: The Price
entry.summary:
Author: dante0220

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,844Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 8

Summary: In the "Wicked Day", Merlin tries to save Uther's life. As Emrys, he tries to cast the healing spell. Unfortunately, Morgana's necklace contains an *extra* twist. As both healing spell and aging spell go wrong, Merlin is forced to flee. Kilgarrah takes him to safety. Mithian and Rodor grant him sanctuary. There Merlin realizes still more about his secondary royal destiny.

entry.title: A Dark Place Between
entry.summary:
Author: exohexoh

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,827Chapters: 1/40Kudos: 3

Summary: Everybody knew that Emrys had spent his life preparing to join the realm’s revered warrior-druids, those sworn to protect Camelot from the demons of the Between. What they didn’t know was that Emrys had no intention of fighting alongside them. Rather, he sought to destroy them from within. Now, in the heart of the court which laid waste to his homeland, Emrys faces danger from all sides. Not least of which is a prince who would seemingly like nothing more than to see him ruined . . . in more ways than one. A quest for vengeance.A love that cannot be.A dangerous secret.A dark place between. Or . . . In another world, Merlin’s mother died, Arthur’s mother lived, and magic was never outlawed. Raised by Nimueh, it is a very different Merlin who arrives in Camelot.

entry.title: irresistible force (immovable object)
entry.summary:
Author: schweet_heart

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,010Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 116

Summary: To his credit, Merlin had done his best to get out of it. He said it was stupid; that Arthur had nothing to prove to anyone, least of all to him; and that the Knights’ Code didn’t apply to warlocks anyway. Then, when that didn’t work, he said plainly, “I don’t want to hurt you, Arthur!”  “And you won’t,” Arthur said, smugly, and Leon was honestly impressed that Merlin was able to keep from hexing the man there and then. “Come on, Merlin. I thought you were meant to be the most powerful sorcerer in all of Camelot.”  “I am the most powerful sorcerer in all of Camelot,” Merlin retorted, folding his arms as Arthur pushed back his chair. “Which is why I have better things to do than to fight my own husband in a duel.”

entry.title: Rise of Starion✨
entry.summary:
Author: Yoker

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,712Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 13

Summary: After the fire in the ward's room, Merlin chooses to ignore Gaius's warnings and help Morgana. The witch accepts Merlin's help, not knowing the true extent of the servant's power or his secret identity. One night, however, the sorceress receives a prophecy. A prophecy that changes the course of everyone's life, but it's not like Merlin hadn't changed that already. The dragonlord was never supposed to help Morgana; he had strayed from his way, and now, The Gods were furious. They didn't, however, punish him; no, they just changed his destiny to one he can't escape. Arthur finds out far too much in one night, leaving him to wonder if his friend hides more than what's already been exposed. or This is an absolute spin-off, no order or chronological use of og timeline whatsoever!I don't know what I'm doing, and that's the beauty of it!Maybe smut??? entry.title: Prince Arthur And The Sorrows Of Death
entry.summary:
Author: jouceras

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,008Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 2

Summary: A DEADLY SICKNESS WAS SPREADING THROUGH CAMELOT, killing every living being on its path. With his father bedridden, Prince Arthur Pendragon had to try to save his life. His courageous and noble intentions were enough to make one of the Gods themselves appear before him.Arawn, the God of Death, spoke of the Quest of the Holy Grail. Its magical blood that could save Prince Arthur's land. With this, he left the Prince.In a hidden village, surrounded by magic itself, lived Merlin. A sorcerer that could heal any ills, except the one that ravaged the land. He, too, heard tale of the Quest of the Holy Grail. And, for the cause, decided to become Prince Arthur Pendragon's squire. For his own safety, Merlin kept his magic hidden, because the King was unkind to such practices.Little did this unlikely union know that love could grow between a prince and his squire. How their fates were undeniably tied together. The two sides of the same coin.

entry.title: in the night.
entry.summary:
Author: fallen_stxr

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,412Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: .... Arthur had hid everything. Merlin snuck out of the bed anyway with a dimly lit candle, gently scouring the cupboards and drawers. The soft shift of wood and the slow scan of eyes. As the chance of finding anything sharp decreased, his desperation increased. At some point, the candle was blown out and left to roll on the floor somewhere. His movement became frantic – feverous. Drawers rattled and closets slammed with no interest of Arthur’s presence. He wanted it. The catharsis. The release. The blood. The cuts. The pain. He needed it. All of it. ...... Merlin has a nightmare and wants to cut while in the beginning of his recovery.

entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: ReyloTrash2187

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 168,592Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 857

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life untouched—by kindness, by desire, or anything resembling real intimacy. It never mattered. Not until a certain annoying manservant came to Camelot—Merlin—who disregarded all strict royal etiquette and showed no restraint when it came to sudden, reckless displays of affection. Now, there’s something impossible in the space between them, something Arthur doesn’t know how to name—only that he aches to close the distance.*A slow-burn touched-starved Arthur Pendragon story.*Guys, there was only one bed.Guys, some obscure quest in the cold far-up mountains made them "huddle for warmth".Guys, they might give in to this farm fantasy of theirs.Can't I just put all the tropes in there?This fic is rated MSI for Maximum Self Indulgence.
